abstract: After aggressively trying to crack Russia for years, the Walt Disney Company agreed to buy 49 percent of a television channel in a country it has viewed as an untapped market.
snippet: After aggressively trying to crack Russia for years, the Walt Disney Company agreed to buy 49 percent of a television channel in a country it has viewed as an untapped market.

headline.main: Disney Channel to Be Introduced in Russia
headline.print_headline: Disney in TV Deal in Russia
